definition: omega-(Methylthio)-(E)-alkanal oxime + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Glutathione + Oxygen <=> (E)-1-(Glutathione-S-yl)-omega-(methylthio)alkylhydroximate + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O
name: (E)-omega-(methylthio)alkananaldoxime,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
